title: How to Delete a Replay?
body: I have installed a match Replay from the new client (which is great) but I want to know how to delete it. Does installing replays take up space on your hard drive?

replies.body: Replays should be stored in your Documents folder.  You'll find it in League of Legends, as .rofl files.  Hope that helps!

> as .rofl files.

Whoever came up with that file extension needs a gold star.
Alright I've found it. It's not on the same hard drive as I have League installed on to so that was a bit confusing. Thanks for the help!
where did u find that? plz tell. ty
Wait so is it in the Riot Games folder or is it just in Documents under the name League of Legends? Thanks for the help
Replays are in your Documents and not in Riot Games, with the directory ending at Documents\League of Legends\Replays.

How do you remove the folder though? i tried to download a replay but it failed then i didn't try to download it again. Then, after that, the folder cannot be deleted, I tried to delete it multiple times but it just keeps coming back. How do i get rid of it?
